headline: Short Sellers Bet Against Private Credit Lenders
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Hedge funds are betting that trade wars, a shrinking economy and rising strain among borrowers will begin to hit private credit in the US. So far, the gamble’s paying off.Most Read from BloombergThe Battle Over the Fate of Detroit’s Renaissance CenterNYC Lost $9 Billion of Income to Miami, Palm Beach in Five YearsNJ Transit Urges Commuters to Work Remotely If Union StrikesNYC Real Estate Industry Asks Judge to Block New Broker Fee LawNJ Transit Strike Would Be ‘Disaster’ for Regio
